ground_truth_reviews.comment: The discount calculation correctly applies the 15% rate for premium users on orders over $100. However, it fails to implement the business requirement that limits the total discount to a maximum of $50. For large orders, this will result in a discount greater than the allowed cap.

title: feat: Add discount calculation for premium users
body: This change introduces a new method to calculate the final price for an order, applying a 15% discount for premium users on orders over $100.
